snippet: The author of “Coraline,” which celebrated its 10th anniversary last month, read C. S. Lewis as a child and thought, “When I am a writer, I shall do parenthetical asides.”
abstract: By the Book interview with Neil Gaiman, author of book Coraline, which recently celebrated its 10th anniversary.
lead_paragraph: The author of “Coraline,” which celebrated its 10th anniversary last month, read C. S. Lewis as a child and thought, “When I am a writer, I shall do parenthetical asides.”

headline.seo: Neil Gaiman Shares His Reading Habits
